10 Financial Mistakes as an OnlyFans Model

10 Financial Mistakes as an OnlyFans Model

Losing money or putting up with situations affecting your earnings on OnlyFans can be devastating, especially for models just starting out on the platform.

How much money can you earn on Onlyfans?

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 13 sec

Onlyfans has made its mark in the content creation industry, empowering creators and allowing them to earn good rewards for their creative works. News of individuals earning a significant amount of money on the platform has become mainstream, motivating several other creators to consider utilizing the platform. 

During the 2020 lockdown, many social media platforms and other software companies experienced a massive surge in popularity, with many seeking solace in digital interaction. Onlyfans is part of this story, growing from 20 million users before the pandemic to 120 million users in over 12 months. This increase of over 500% contributes to a seven-fold increase in the company’s revenue.  

With these huge amounts of money flowing into the Onlyfans platform and several influencers reportedly making over a million dollars monthly, many decided to opt-in for their share of the cake. Although featuring quite a lucrative business model, Onlyfans differs from the get-rich-quick platform many think it is. There are a lot of underlying factors that aid creators in making big bucks on the platform, and when ignored, they will see you earning bits. 

Indeed the Onlyfans platform has the potential to make you a significant amount monthly. Hence, we have detailed in this article exactly how much you can expect to make with your Onlyfans account. Also, it discussed some of the profitable niches and techniques you can apply to increase your earning potential on the platform. 

Make an appointment now

Onlyfans’ Business Model and Their Incentive Structure

To figure out your earning reach on the Onlyfans platform, a great place to start is by studying their business model and how they incentivize their content creators. Onlyfans run on a relatively simple but quite effective business model. The subscription-based structure is unique to the entertainment and adult content industry. Succinctly, Onlyfans provides a platform for content creators to share exclusive content protected by a paywall. To access these contents, users have to subscribe monthly, via which creators can make money for their content.

The model might look similar to specific media platforms like Netflix and Hulu, requiring users to subscribe before gaining access to content on their platforms. However, the unique difference here is that Onlyfans allow users to choose their favorite creators to subscribe to rather than having access to the whole platform. This arrangement offers so many benefits to creators, including direct interaction with their fans.

Also, Onlyfans give creators freedom of operation as they can choose to create any content they desire. Providing room for explicit content gives it more appeal than other social media platforms. With its subscription-based model, Onlyfans hold a significant advantage over others in the adult entertainment industries.

Onlyfans generates revenue by taking a percentage of users’ subscriptions to creators’ content. It takes 20% while leaving the creators 80% of each subscription they get.

Now, let us look at how Onlyfans content creators earn on the platform. Being a robust platform, there exists more than one way to generate income on Onlyfans. By using any of these means or combining them, creators can earn significantly high gains on the platform.

Monthly Subscription

This is the number one significant way creators can make money on Onlyfans as it is the revenue-generating model for the company. With subscription rates ranging from a minimum of $4.99 to $49.99 per month, creators can set a subscription price that suits them. Usually, subscription price varies depending on the niche and how exclusive the content is. While a wide range of content is allowed on Onlyfans, NSFW content rules the space. Because the platform is populated by NSFW content, subscription price tends to rank higher in niches that feature such. However, some SFW creators have successfully charged significantly high subscription prices for their content and maintained a healthy flow of monthly subscribers.

Pay-Per-View (PPV) Content

Onlyfans give creators direct access to people that consume their content, aka their fans. With this access, Onlyfans also equipped its content creators with a way to make money using this means. The Pay-Per-View method of earning offers higher earning potential than the subscription method. Utilizing this method, creators have been able to generate a staggering amount of income monthly. Although this feature can be used in any niche, creators offering NSFW content are more likely to benefit from this income generation style. At a minimum of $5, creators can attach their preferred price to each piece of content.

Here is how it works:

PPV messages

By attaching a special price to a specific direct message, creators can earn more when fans view these messages. To view these messages, such fans must pay the required amount to access them. This feature is available to all Onlyfans accounts, including free and paid. Luckily, using this feature is relatively easy; all you need to do is create a particular message (which usually includes certain media content), target it at specific fans or all of them, attach a description of the PPV message and add your preferred price. Voila, your fans can now view this content at your set price.

PPV Posts

In a similar style to the one mentioned above, creators can use PPV posts to generate more income. By attaching a special price to a post, viewers need to pay to view what hides behind that pay way. You must attach a very catchy description, and your loyal fans will happily pay to view your posts.

PPV Streams

Several creators offer contents that involve streaming at regular intervals. For example, a creator in the cooking niche might live-stream themselves cooking a complete meal. Using the PPV streaming option, they can easily earn more money from this special event and entertain their viewers. Consider it like selling tickets to a live event. You can easily attach a time that the streaming will go live and other necessary details concerning the event.

Tips

Ever being served by a pretty-looking waitress with impeccable character, and you decided to leave a pretty handsome tip for her? Yes, we’ve all done it. This kind of method of earning is also employed by Onlyfans, giving creators another way to increase their income. Fans who enjoy your content can show their love by tipping you directly on the platform. As a creator, you can receive tips in various ways, including message tipping, profile tipping, and post tipping.

Referral Bonus

Onlyfans sure knows how to reward its content creators, and with that, it features a referral program that pays you 5% of your referee’s earnings. At first, it introduced the referral program as a lifetime opportunity to earn on the Onlyfans platform. This meant you get to enjoy referral bonuses on any creator you refer, so far they continue earning on the platform. However, in 2021, after witnessing a significant rise in users of the platform, they introduced caps to their referral program. Now, you can only earn a referral bonus for up to 12 months after making a referral or when you earn a total referral bonus of $50,000 on that particular creator. Despite these limitations, this is still an effective way to earn on the platform, and when added to others, it can sum up to something big.

How much do Onlyfans creators earn?

Now comes the question of exactly how much you should expect to earn as a content creator on Onlyfans. The answer is not as straightforward as you might think, yet it’s not too complicated. The subscription-based platform offers significant potential over other social media platforms that feature almost the same content. Making money on Instagram, for example, is quite tedious, and most influencers have to rely on sponsorships. On Onlyfans you can take the bull by the horn and control your earnings by putting in the work.

There are reports of creators making thousands of dollars per month. In August 2020, an American actress, Bella Thorne, made a million dollars in 24 hours on Onlyfans. About a week later, she reported that the number had increased to two million dollars. However, the event did stir up some controversies in the community, with some creators feeling threatened by the influential actress’s presence on the platform. Nonetheless, making that much for many creators was an impressive feat and an eye-opener to just how much potential the Onlyfans platform holds.

Soon after, several celebrities started utilizing the platform to earn more money or promote their careers. These include Cardi B, Blac Chyna, Tyga, and many more. Some of these celebrities make millions of dollars per month. However, their success can easily be attributed to their preexisting fame before joining the platform.

Creators who know the game and have proven resilient in the industry have been able to rake in thousands of dollars per month, even without celebrity status. While there is no limit to how much you can earn on the Onlyfans platform, statistics show that not all creators make significant sums on the platform. There were some basic requirements before you could be sure to earn the big bucks on Onlyfans.

Facts about Onlyfans earnings

  • The average earning is $180/month.

According to statistics, joining Onlyfans as an average individual, you are most likely to earn about $180 per month. XSRUS calculations, however, excluded the tips earned by these creators. Nonetheless, these statistics tell a good story of how most creators are not making a significant amount on Onlyfans as many might think.

  • The top earners are just 1% of the total accounts.

As wild as it may be to believe, earnings on Onlyfans are highly unevenly distributed. The top 1% of creators on the platform make 33% of all the money. Top earners on the platform are celebrities and influencers who already have a cult following before moving to the Onlyfans platform, which skews the earnings in their favor.

These statistics offer insight into how much work needs to go into setting up an Onlyfans account as a regular content creator to make a significant amount of money. Hence, there are lots of things to put in place to assure you of success on the platform. Thinking about these things alone can be mind-numbingly tedious and take quite some time if you try to figure it out yourself. Here is why you need a reputable agency to guide you on this journey and help you achieve incredible feats. Apply now to get the best out of your account.

Make an appointment now

The Most Profitable Niches on Onlyfans

Earning on the Onlyfans platform can be tricky, especially if you are starting. Featuring several niches to choose from, you might need help wondering which one is the most profitable. In this section, we have highlighted some very profitable niches you can consider on Onlyfans. (Note: this list includes NSFW niches)

Adult content

It is no news that the platform is famous for promoting adult content. This type of content stands at the top of the list as it is the one that can earn you use to significantly grow your account and start earning within a brief period. Although it looks that way, it isn’t easy to pull off as it requires significant work and dedication to make such an account profitable. Many creators in other niches occasionally add adult content to their posts to attract more subscribers. It is indeed the holy grail of Onlyfans niches. 

Cosplay

Another niche closely related to the adult content niche is this one. With lots of people invested in the movie industry, consuming their content daily, serving content related to this on Onlyfans will surely attract dedicated audiences. Many people want to see their favorite comic character in action right in front of their eyes. If you have a knack for cosplaying, there is a big audience for you out there willing to pay you to display your talent. Many cosplayers tend to add adult content to their routine, raising their earnings. 

Food content 

People love to eat, and they love to connect with other people who share this hobby. If you love to cook, love to eat, and are okay with doing these on video, then this might be the best niche for you. It has proven to be quite lucrative, and you can earn a decent amount doing it if you consistently upload new content for your fans’ enjoyment. 

Health and Fitness

In the world of social media today, the current trend is eating healthy and staying fit. Many people have discovered how important staying fit is to lead a long healthy life. As an expert or an influencer looking to guide people on this journey, this particular niche is healthy. You can share your daily routine, effective weight loss program, and many helpful kinds of stuff. You will be getting paid for doing what you love. It is one niche you can be sure of a healthy flow of consistent subscribers. 

Beauty and fashion

Everyone wants to look great, go to parties, turn heads, and get their crush to notice them. While some people possess a natural fashion sense, many do not have the hang of it. Luckily, if you are in-depth into the beauty and fashion industry and know your way around, you can now get paid for sharing your knowledge. You teach people beauty hacks and the best skincare products to use. Talk about fashion trends, and share your shopping experience and the beautiful clothes you got to try out. This niche is packed with so much content that you always have something new to share daily.

How to Increase Your Earnings on Onlyfans 

Now you have started your Onlyfans account, but you are yet to earn that consistent lump sum that will earn you financial freedom. Listed below are things you can do to increase your earnings on the Onlyfans platform. 

Promotion

As a newbie on the Onlyfans platform, you must consistently promote your brand on and outside the platform to increase your followers. Many creators tend to focus more on creating content and less on finding actual people that will consume this content. When you are just starting, you need to put effort into promoting your account and gathering more followers from other platforms. Utilize social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook to promote your content. Keep in mind that not all these platforms support the posting of explicit content, so you need to double-check your posts before you share them on such platforms. Include links to your Onlyfans in the bio of other social media platforms and point them in the right direction by adding a solid call to action to your posts. Each time people want to find you on Onlyfans, they know precisely how to go about it. 

Create Quality Content

To keep people glued to your page, you need to offer them quality content they would be willing to pay for. The gathering is only one part of the journey to earn more on Onlyfans. When making content, keep the quality high. Invest in tools and quality people that will improve the quality of your content. For example, suppose you venture into beauty and fashion. In that case, you need a good camera for taking quality pictures, basic lighting, and a decent background to add some aesthetics. You do not have to go overboard and buy the most expensive digital camera. A phone with superb camera quality could serve just well. 

Be Consistent 

Nobody got it right with just a few tries. You need to put in the effort to see your desired result consistently. Over the years, we have seen social media reward content creators that were consistent with their craft. Most of the big names in the industry today started with little to no following, but by consistently building, they could grow their reach and earn more. The same applies to Onlyfans. Have a schedule and stick to it. Your fans expect you to upload new content regularly; you should satisfy them. If you slack off and your subscribers do not see new content from you for some days, they might feel you need to offer them the value they paid for. Showing up consistently builds trust, and this way, you can ensure your subscribers will be around for a long time. 

Drive engagement

Your fans are looking for more than just a few pictures or videos of you doing something. They want to connect with you on a personal level. They want to chat with you, interact with you, and get more personal treatment they feel they deserve. The goal is to make sure you do not bore them. Sending one-word replies to their chats is a quick way to discourage them and lose subscribers. You can easily charge for these personal interactions, and fans will willingly pay if you offer as much value. 

You can be creative with this part as well. For example, you can organize a fun quiz among your fans, and the winner gets exclusive content from you for free. Incentivizing your fans sometimes can drive up their loyalty, and they will be willing to spend more in the future. 

Conclusion

Making money on Onlyfans is more involved than they make it sound. If you want to join the top 1% that enjoy the best part of the platform, then you need to make some wise moves. Promoting your page and sharing quality content consistently are ways to grow your account and increase your earning potential. You do not have to go through this journey alone. Help is available from certified professionals, qualified to guide you every step of the way. Apply now.
